name: coltish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A coltish person is young and energetic but awkward: Gigi is a coltish young girl growing up in turn-of-the-century Paris. coltish limbs See
colt
More examplesFewer examplesShe was coltish; now she's womanly.I've always liked your coltish enthusiasm. She was charming and coltish, a bit like a schoolgirl at her first grown-up party.
